structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: License Without Examination To Licensees Of Other Jurisdictions
law.text: The board may issue a nursing home administratorâ€™s license without examination, to any person who holds a valid license as a nursing home administrator from another jurisdiction; provided, that the board finds that the standards for licensure in such other jurisdiction are at least the substantial equivalent of those prevailing in this commonwealth, and that the applicant is otherwise qualified.
